title: Apple releases Xcode 15.2 with Vision Pro support
description:
Apple has released Xcode 15.2, a major update that paves the way for the upcoming Vision Pro headset set to hit the shelves on 2 February. The new Xcode version introduces support for the Vision Pro headset through the integration of the visionOS SDK, opening up opportunities for developers to craft immersive visionOS apps tailored... Read more »

The post Apple releases Xcode 15.2 with Vision Pro support appeared first on Developer Tech News.
